m_szDocSumamry: Delivered to your inbox for free! British low-cost airline carrier EasyJet has detailed an innovative plan to build an eco-friendly hybrid airplane fitted with a hydrogen fuel cell. Still at the embryonic stage of development, the hybrid drivetrain is built around hydrogen fuel cells located in the cargo hold.
